name: Sheep Heist
description:
Do you think you can be stealthy enough to steal all of the farmers sheep?

Try your luck at this short puzzle game where your goal is to find and steal all 3 sheep and get them to your truck before anybody sees you! Be especially careful when meeting any of the dogs as they might chase you down!


Controls

Movement - WASD/Arrow keys

Sneak - SPACE (toggle)

Back/Exit - ESC

Install instructions 

1. Download and extract .zip file

2. Run Sheep_Heist.exe

3. Enjoy!

Project details

This is the first game I ever made! I'm really excited to work on many other projects! If you are interested in what any of those projects might look like, feel free to follow my progress over on YouTube
